name: Priklepal
description:
Made during the Fall 2018 prickly themed game jam of University of Washington's Game Development Club.
The game is also featured in the bundle here:
https://uw-gamedevclub.itch.io/uw-gamedevclub-fall-2018-bundle

A robot crash landed on a strange planet and needs to rebuild its ship to get home. 

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Right Click: Shoot projectile at yourself
  • Left Hold by Wrenchposts: Heal
  • Space: Interact
